name: shareButton
description: The share button you want to use

name: title
description: Override title meta tag for LinkedIn and Reddit, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag for LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Telegram and Pinterest, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag for Pinterest only, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: redirectUrl
description: Override redirectUrl for Messenger (desktop), default: null

name: opened
description: Stream that emits when share dialog has opened

name: closed
description: Stream that emits when share dialog has closed
